review.title: Great value for being close to San Francisco
review.reviewText:
By staying outside of San Francisco we ended up saving at least $100-$200 on the cost of a one night stay.  Hotel had plenty of free parking even though they were sold out.  It was very close to a shopping mall in case you were inclined to wander around or needed soemthing.  Several restaurants nearby, including one that was walking distance.  Had easy freeway access and only minutes away from a Costco gas location if you are driving.  Also minutes away from SFO
Paul Mitchell products for amenities. Was surpised by the addtion of individually wrapped makeup remover towelettes to the personal amenities ~ great idea!!  Our room looked out into the courtyard which was very inviting with lots of grassy area and outdoor seating areas.
review.positiveRemarks: We had a double queen, quite comfortable.  Good looking common areas to unwind.  Small snacks and beverages also available in the lobby.
review.negativeRemarks: Our key cards did not work for the room - had to go back up to the front to have them redone and had to wait in check-in line again.  Only one clerk.
review.locationRemarks: Very close to several dining options including family friendly.  Minutes away from a shopping mall and easy access on/off freeways.

review.title: Wonderful hotel near airport
review.reviewText: We were fortunate to be given an upgrade to a suite because our room was not ready when we arrived after check-in.  The hotel has a lot of amenities and we used the laundry facilities. We picked this place because they had a shuttle to take you to the airport. All the people working there were very nice.
review.positiveRemarks: The staff and amenities offered as well as the ability to print boarding passes and a computerized information board.
review.locationRemarks: Located in San Bruno near the airport.  Lots of places nearby to eat and they had their own place to eat as well.

review.reviewText: It was convenient and comfortable. Thank you Courtyard Marriott

review.title: Park and Fly
review.reviewText: After booking the room thru Expedia I called the hotel directly and asked about leaving my car there.  I was told I could leave it up to 2 weeks with no charge but when I got there they told me it was 11.00 per day because I had not booked the park and fly package thru expedia.  They said the shuttle runs to the airport every 30 minutes and we got to the airport easily, but on our return trip we expected again it running every 30 minutes.  When it didn't come we called and they said it would be there in 20 minutes.  After another 30 minutes we called again and were told the shuttle had broke down.  They told us to take a cab and they would reimburse us which they did.  But when we pulled up in the cab and shuttle was in their driveway .
review.positiveRemarks: Small and close to SFO
review.negativeRemarks: The shuttle system
review.locationRemarks: Plenty of places to eat and shopping nearby

review.reviewText: Comfortable, friendly staff. As always, Marriott could use a 22st century cable tv listing.

review.title: Good location. Close to airport and shopping.
review.reviewText: Easy cab/Uber ride to many attractions in the SF area. Shuttle to/from the airport. Nice lobby/lounge. Clean and comfortable rooms.
review.positiveRemarks: Location.
review.negativeRemarks: More gym equipment.
review.locationRemarks: Nearby shopping and restaurants. Close to the airport.

review.title: Spring break stay
review.reviewText: Check in and out were fast. No microwave. Very noisy. Great food.

review.title: Close to airport
review.reviewText: Good clean place to stay with comfortable bedding

review.title: Nice hotel close to the airport
review.reviewText: Very nice hotel located within a 10 minute drive to the airport.  Only a 5 minute drive to the rental car return area.  Airport shuttle runs every 20 minutes.
review.positiveRemarks: Close to the airport.

review.title: Near Tanforan
review.reviewText: Nice facility near Tanforan and 380. Xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxc

review.title: Great location, easy access to freeway
review.reviewText: We reserved a room with two queens and got a room with two doubles which was disappointing as we did inquire at check in and were told the room had two queens but it was not a major issue and we were able to deal with that.  The hotel is located close to restaurants and shopping and has easy access to freeways to get to the city.   The room was clean, quiet and pleasant.  The rate was quite good for the holiday weekend, a great value compared to other local hotels.
review.positiveRemarks: Clean, quiet, great location, easy access to downtown San Francisco.
review.negativeRemarks: We shower in the room was in need of some repair at the floor level grout lines.
review.locationRemarks: A large shopping mall with restaurants within a block and the airport was a mile away making this very convenient location for air travelers.

review.title: Very good quality hotel
review.reviewText: Everything was quite well. The room is clean and renovated. Parking was plenty. Internet is fine but could be better. Room is clean and comfy.

review.title: a quiet ok hotel
review.reviewText:
room is not very big, but ok.
the hot water is not hot enough, or hard to adjust the temperature.
the breakfast has few choices.
suit for a quick visit, but not great for a long stay.

review.title: The elevator was a little too far from the lobby.
review.reviewText: We found the social area very pleasing and the choice of food and drink was excellent.  The airport shuttle was very pleasant and timely.
review.positiveRemarks: We liked the location, the openness and the cleanliness.

review.title: Great stay in San Bruno
review.reviewText: Great hotel, pool was clean, rooms were comfy. Beautiful facility!

review.title: Very good hotel near SFO
review.reviewText: Very Good Hotel near if you need to be near the airport

review.title: Excellent choice near SO
review.reviewText: The Courtyard in San Bruno is an excellent choice for a stay near SFO airport.  My room was great, with all expected amenities.  The service was superb, no issues at all.  Upon check-in, I arrived a day early due to a change in plans.  the staff accommodated this change with barely a question.  Fortunately, they were not sold out on the weekend I arrived.   The bar / grill inside the hotel is convenient, had all the essentials covered and had very helpful and friendly staff.
review.positiveRemarks: convenient location, good work space in room, easy access to restaurants and airport.
review.negativeRemarks: Television remote was sluggish, I think due to using Dish Network - some channels were not clear.
review.locationRemarks: The location has many restaurants a short drive away, some even walking distance.  Shopping is just to the north if you have any last minute needs.

review.title: Going home
review.reviewText: needed place near airport after a week in Napa. Excellent.
review.positiveRemarks: Proximity to airport. Neighborhood, Restaurant nearby (Jack's), safe neighborhood
review.negativeRemarks: nothing
review.locationRemarks: get to airport quickly. Great shopping nearby.

review.title: reasonable place for the money
review.reviewText:
Check-in process was seamless. room was clean and bed was comfortable. Hotel front desk comped us with free breakfast to make up for the inconvenience as stated below. Overall stay was pleasant nonetheless.

Disappointed about room readiness (clogged toilet) upon arrival. Service maintenance staff were not immediately available to address the issue in a timely manner. waited 30 min in the room, until the hotel staff decided to move us to another available room.
review.positiveRemarks: efficient check-in/check-out process, courteous hotel staff. room cleanliness and comfort.
review.negativeRemarks: room layout (unusual placement of TV - on the side of the bed vs. in front, which is commonly found other hotels)
review.locationRemarks: Hotel is conveniently located 10 minutes away from the Airport, 5min drive to Tanforan shopping center which houses various drink and dinning options.

review.reviewText: The hotel is near the airport and the staff have exceptional customer service.

managementResponses.response:
Hello Michael,

Thank your for taking the time to provide some feedback on your recent stay with us. Our apologies that an issue in the bedding was found and that the room was smaller than anticipated. Standard rooms at this property are about 300 square feet with the suites being considerably larger. We hope that you continue to stay with Marriott in the future.

Warm Regards,
Courtyard Staff

review.title: Disappointing after long trip
review.reviewText: First bad experience at a Courtyard. Cleanliness an issue (bedding) and room more cramped than other Courtyards.
review.negativeRemarks: Focus on cleanliness.
review.locationRemarks: Convenient to airport.

review.title: Nice Alternative to Downtown SF
review.reviewText: We stayed there because it was near the airport and near a Bart station with great parking and easy access to SF and other points.  We were pleasantly surprised, the hotel was very clean and modern and adequate for our needs.  Breakfast, lunch and dinner were available if necessary - but not in a formal dining room.  If you need several rooms and don't want to pay the cost of downtown SF hotels (plus tax and parking) this is a good alternative.  Found several good restaurants in nearby South San Francisco.
review.positiveRemarks: No fuss, very efficient and clean with good beds.  We were driving so parking near our room was appreciated.
review.negativeRemarks: The bathrooms are small for two people and the lighting could be better in the bathrooms (plus a magnifying mirror would be appreciated).
review.locationRemarks: Proximity to Bart, Airport and SF.

review.title: Nice hotel and easy to get places.
review.reviewText: Hotel was good and staff were good.  Just that maid service was lacking in that the lady couldn't speak English, so when we asked her to do things like leave more regular coffee I don't think she understood.
review.positiveRemarks: Location was easy to get on and off major highways and go visit the city and attractions.

managementResponses.response: Thank you so much for your business and feedback. Our apologies for the thermostat and for the noisy neighbors as well. We hope to see you again for a future stay.

review.title: Extended Weekend in San Francisco
review.reviewText: The overall condition of the property was well maintained.  The property was also convenient to a BART station and shopping for basic necessities.  We did experience a problem with the thermostat and couldn't get the room to a comfortable temperature; however, the staff was very responsive in resolving this matter.  Unfortunately, they moved us from an outside room to a room facing the courtyard...where other guests were not so polite in keeping their conversations to a whisper way into the night and early morning.
review.positiveRemarks: See above....convenience to BART and basic necessity shopping.
review.negativeRemarks: Establish courtyard hrs similar to pool.  If already established, monitor compliance to the hours.
review.locationRemarks: Nothing much to do in San Bruno, but the convenience of the BART station makes access to everything in San Francisco extremely convenient.

review.title: Amazing Hotel With Awesome Service
review.reviewText:
Amazing hotel with staff willing to go out of their way to help. 

Pros : Close to the airport, fantastic property and amazing service. 

Cons: None barring the fact that its far from the city ( but you do not stay here if you're a tourist wanting to be in the heart of SF, which is understood ) 

The stay was amazing from the shuttle to pick us up at the airport to the breakfast and the courtesy of the staff it was all great. The property is cozy with a  bonfire provision and a very private feel to the rooms. Great stay !
review.positiveRemarks: Courtesy of the staff and the warm feel to the place.
review.negativeRemarks: Just take the place as is with all the wonderful people working in there and put it in heart of the city :)

review.title: A nice home base while visiting San Francisco.
review.reviewText:
We spent most of our time touring San Francisco but wanted a clean and quiet refuge at night.  This was perfect for us.

While we were checking out, we asked the attendant questions about the Napa area on our way back home.  She took the time to get us there by the most scenic and least traveled route through San Francisco and gave us some good suggestions for the area.  She really went the extra mile for us.

Everyone at the hotel was very friendly.
review.positiveRemarks: Peaceful and quiet.
review.locationRemarks: There was a nearby Mall but we didn't go out exploring to see what else was nearby.

review.title: Bad experience.
review.reviewText: One staff member, cashier of the dining room, has bad attitude, she was so rud, make us fell like discriminate just because ours Mexican aparence, before we start spoke to her, she say I'M NOT SPEAK SPANISH, that is not acceptable, after the issue we spoke to a supervisor from the front desk, and he doing nothing.
By SFO, but off the beaten path a bit. Very well maintained hotel. Great for an option just outside San Francisco. Good launch point for all Bay Area activities.

review.title: Budget but just fine
review.reviewText:
I wouldn't recommend this hotel for a romantic getaway, but for a simple work stay or pre/post flight stay is was fine. The rooms were very big, the bathroom was clean and the beds were comfortable.  

We did hear very loud airplane noise all night long, though only intermittently.  But it will wake up light sleepers!

review.title: Stay
review.reviewText:
Expensive!
You want more, ok, overpriced, added a $20 charge unexplained

review.title: Nice and clean Hotel
review.reviewText: Easy location to access, it's right off the freeway. All the staff was helpful and very polite. Clean and comfortable rooms with nice sliding patio doors. The mall was close buy and many stores and restaurants. The beach was less the 15 mins away. I would stay here again. Parking was included as well.

review.title: This hotel was awesome!!!!!
review.reviewText: The hotel was very clean.  It was near San Francisco which was convenient.  It was quiet.  i even used guest services.   The parking was free anf limited wifi was free as well.  The only thing I missed is complimentary coffee,  and I don't mean free coffee maker in the room.
review.positiveRemarks: cleaniness
review.negativeRemarks: complimentary coffee

review.title: hotel nearby airport. Early rest after long flight
review.reviewText:
This hotel keeps on upgrades. We come to San Fransisco often. This hotel is our regular choice if possible. This stay, We are impressed with how comfortable the bed is. The room looks newly renovated and clean. Hotel locates in safe and quite area. Good restaurants & shopping nearby. We always know we can get a good rest here.

There were a couple arguing in the hallway late evening. The management did not come soon enough to stop the notices .
review.positiveRemarks: They show the pride to keep the hotel in the top class.
review.negativeRemarks: Front desk should be more helpful. They said no to get our guess a room near by ours. They said nothing was turned in when we reported loss of iPhone
review.locationRemarks: Locates nearby corporate center. Good shopping center is less than 5 minutes drive away.

review.title: Convenient and economical.
review.reviewText: Slept like a baby. Check in and check out was very quick. As for the room, it was very clean.
review.positiveRemarks: Staff are very helpful and friendly.  Breakfast was on the expensive side but was very good. I like that the location is very close to restaurants.
review.negativeRemarks: Housekeeping needs to be a little bit more attentive in getting rooms prepped after checkouts. Overall, my room was clean though.

review.title: One night before trip
review.reviewText: Location is near shopping and nice food options.  Check in was easy.  The room was clean.
review.positiveRemarks: Hallways are long and dark.  Elevators not placed well, older hotel.  Shuttle times were not explained well ny staff. outdoor balcony was not clean.
review.locationRemarks: Near a mall ,bank, and resturants

review.reviewText: The hotel was quiet and the service was good.  I would recommend this hotel.
review.positiveRemarks: Indoor pool and spa.

review.title: Quiet and convient.
review.reviewText:
Hotel shuttle bus driver was very helpful to pick my guest from SFO airport. 
Location is close to shopping mall and Bart station.

review.title: Very nice staff and hotel
review.reviewText:
Hotel is a little aged but very well maintained! Rooms were very clean, front desk staff super friendly and the food in the Bistro was delicious! I will stay here again!
Hotel also provided a crib & high chair for us.
I haven't used the amenities but the gym & pool looked nice

review.title: Pleasant staff, good experience
review.reviewText: Good place to stay - free parking, clean rooms, quiet atmosphere, close to city.
fantastic.  adult beverage priced to high.  we could walk down the street to a local eatery and get three to one drinks.  a managers happy hour would be nice
review.positiveRemarks: location
review.negativeRemarks: high prices
review.locationRemarks: business section

managementResponses.response: Dear Tim: I am so sorry your room was not as clean as it should have been and that we let you down. I will share your comments with our staff to do better in the future. I hope you will stay with us again in the future. We appreciate your business and comments.

review.title: Not clean
review.reviewText: Room was obviously not cleaned as there was pee on the toilet. After being moved to another room, that was better however still not clean as there was hair all over the floor, the carpet and even the towels. While the front desk said, "we're sorry about that" I expected a more serious reaction. Unlcean rooms are unacceptable and they didn't seem to truly care. NEVER recommending this particular location to anyone. I've had much more pleasant experiences at lower quality hotels. Perhaps this location is begging for a shake up with their management and staff!!!

review.title: Within minutes from the airport
review.reviewText: One block away from highway 101, this hotel provides easy access to the SFO Airport within minutes, while being only a 20 min drive to San Francisco. It's a very nice place to stay if you want to visit the city during the day, then drive back and enjoy a drink by the fireplace in the inner court in the evening. A calm neighborhood, with a shopping mall and several restaurents in the area.

review.title: Very economical hotel
review.reviewText: good hotel staff members, very comfortable free transportation from and to Airport.
review.positiveRemarks: very good for families

review.title: Close to San Francisco
review.reviewText: Room was clean but I thought the sheets could use an improvement.  I didn't expect a high-thread count but you could definitely feel they weren't soft.
review.positiveRemarks: Location to the City.
review.negativeRemarks: The linen sheets
review.locationRemarks: Excellent.

review.title: Nice Hotel, Good Facilities, Pity about Breakfast
review.reviewText: Stayed there one night, facilities were good, nice pool. The room was clean and the bed comfortable however sound insulation was poor. Noise from conversation, baggage trundling, footsteps etc in the corridor was too easily heard in the room. Breakfast was available (at a price) Items were mainly prepackaged and the satisfaction levels  fell below the breakfasts provided, at no additional cost, in most other hotels, many of them in a lower price range. Service was grumpy, perhaps just a bad day.
review.positiveRemarks: Swimming pool and outside seating areas  were good
review.negativeRemarks: Provide a better breakfast preferably at no cost

review.title: Staff exceptionally patient
review.reviewText:
Got lost after many hours of driving from Sonoma to SF. Staff was very helpful and patient giving us directions and being welcoming when we finally arrived. Having a dining area and freshly prepared food available until 10 PM was very helpful and meant we didn't have to go out to find a meal on arrival. 
Everyone courteous, rooms clean and comfortable. 
Would definitely recommend, especially if you have an am flight at SFO.
review.negativeRemarks: just the lights going on automatically, when using bathroom at 3am!! Understand probably safety measure, maybe lower wattage?? :)

review.title: Close to the Bart Station
review.reviewText: Hotel was very comfortable, clean, and walking distance to the San Bruno Bart Station.
Staff was super friendly. Nice indoor pool. N has a washer n dryer
We just stayed one night before we left SF, but it was wonderful. The beds were super comfortable and just what we needed before our departure. Staff was friendly and very accommodating.

review.title: Nice room
review.reviewText: Got in late and was so pleased with the room. Very comfy beds and immaculately clean

managementResponses.response:
Hello Jason:
Thank you so much for staying with us.
We hope to see you again soon!

review.title: Nice hotel
review.reviewText: The hotel was clean and the staff was very helpful.

review.title: Excellent hotel but loud external noise
review.reviewText: This hotel is kept in excellent condition. Our 2-queens room was squeaky clean. The noise from the close-by freeway to the north and El Camino Real to the east was still tolerable. Unfortunately, the noise from starting airplanes is not tolerable for us, so for that reason we won't be back.
review.positiveRemarks: Hotel in excellent shape. Room very clean. 10 minutes from airport.

review.title: Very accommodating
review.reviewText: Quick stay, early morning flight. Great restaurants within 1/2 mile. Could hear the planes but I was able to sleep through them.

review.title: Hotel was quiet, convenient and well priced.
review.reviewText: I stayed here after a night in San Francisco. It was nice to stay at a location that had necessary amenities and a good price.

review.title: Excellent hotel in San Bruno, close to everything
review.reviewText: Needed to stay a couple of days near SFO and this was a perfect location. Great internet and facilities.
review.positiveRemarks: Location and facilities
review.locationRemarks: Restaurants and a big shopping mall nearby

managementResponses.response:
Dear Brady:
I am sorry you were not happy wiith your room at our hotel. We do have some rooms with accessible features and I'm sorry that this was not a good fit for you. We value all our guests and I'm sorry you were disappointed. I hope you will try us again in the future.

review.title: Not the place to reserve through Expedia
review.reviewText: We were told the "only room left" was a handicapped room. Shower and bathroom facilities may have been appropriate for the handicapped but not what we were looking for at $280 per night. And since we had reserved through Expedia, there was no negotiating on price.

review.title: nice hotel, convenient to airport and downtown
review.reviewText: this hotel would be good for families as well as business travelers
review.positiveRemarks: friendly helpful staff, clean, comfortable room

review.title: San Bruno, CA
review.reviewText: Very helpful staff. Available shuttle to airport and local shopping. Very comfortable bed and clean room.
review.positiveRemarks: staff and room
review.negativeRemarks: add a restaurant
review.locationRemarks: near by shopping mall

managementResponses.response: Thank you for taking the time to provide us feedback on your recent stay. My apologies that your room and restaurant experience did not meet expectations. We certainly will be addressing these issues in an effort to improve guest experience at our property. Your business is sincerely appreciated and we hope that you will stay with us again.

review.title: Average strip motel, nothing special at $200/night
review.reviewText: Although my reservation was made weeks in advance, and I arrived around 9pm, they had no rooms left except for a handicap room. I didn't care for the shower, or the closets in that room. The lounge area had people working there, but they wouldn't ask if I wanted anything. They look at you then walk away.

managementResponses.response:
Bill from Vermont:
I am sorry you experienced WiFi and restaurant food availability issues at our hotel. We value all our guests and I'm sorry you were disappointed. We are upgrading our WiFi for faster response times and I will certainly look into the restaurant issues. Thanks for your feedback!

review.title: Nice rooms, but poor management
review.reviewText: First the good: The rooms are large and comfortable. And it's convenient to SFO. But there were a number of problems with my stay. First, the WiFi network is insufficient. I couldn't sign on and when I went down to the front desk to inquire what was going on they said that there were too many guests and that the system was overloaded. That was a first. The fact is that I was NEVER able to connect from my room. I had to go sit in the lobby to connect at 6 a.m. the next morning. Then there's the matter of the restaurant. When I went down to have dinner around 8 p.m. I was told they were our of hamburgers, any dish with chicken of any kind in it and some other things I can't recall. So the selection was pretty meager. I don't know how a hotel of this kind can be caught completely off guard. All in all it was pretty frustrating.
review.positiveRemarks: The room.
review.negativeRemarks: WiFi and the restaurant.
review.locationRemarks: It's along a highway. The only reason to stay is that it's near SFO.

review.title: Nice Hotel with a great location near the airport.
review.reviewText: the hotel is clean and comfortable and meets all business needs. the staff is helpful, the location great and business resources available.
review.positiveRemarks: Nice comfortable, clean room and great location.
review.locationRemarks: Great for the airport. Restaurants available and free parking for the car.

review.reviewText: I came to see my daughter and was very happy this hotel was so close to her house. I liked the workout room, the swimming pool and also the firepit in the courtyard.
review.locationRemarks: San Francisco is close so there are many, many things to do.

review.title: Close to San Francisco airport.
review.reviewText: Very nice hotel. Cafe inside the lobby. Walk across the street for a Chili's or about 1 mile for several dining places at the mall.
review.positiveRemarks: Convienence

review.title: good value for the location
review.reviewText:
Very nice hotel. Room was clean, bed was comfortable. Large bathroom.
Did not offer a free continental breakfast, had a snack-bar with breakfast items you bought individually. Close to Chillis, small shops like Walgreens to buy small food items. Only 45 minute drive to downtown San Fran. Extremely close to SFO airport, but heard none of the noise from airport or hiway.
review.positiveRemarks: Very nice room.
review.negativeRemarks: Free continental breakfast would be nice.

review.title: Nice and comfortable hotel
review.reviewText: Nice hotel, shuttle service to and from airport, close to a nice mall & public transportation.

review.title: Overall satisfaction/or not
review.reviewText: The hotel was clean and the staff friendly and nice. The amenities were somewhat lacking in that the hotel did not offer free breakfasts as other hotels did. They could have at least offered a continental breakfast. The food was too expensive, even the coffee was $2.00 a cup. Otherwise, we enjoyed our stay very much.
review.positiveRemarks: Friendliness and cleanness
review.negativeRemarks: The food prices and amenities
review.locationRemarks: We went to the Trenton restaurant and an Irish pub, the Bueina Vista , where they served liquor and Irish coffee.

review.title: Great hotel.
review.reviewText: Close to the airport. They have their own shuttle (no stopping at 5-6 other places before you get to the airport). I will stay here whenever I need to be near SFO.
review.negativeRemarks: Sports team staying in the same hallway. Very noisy at 2 AM and staff did nothing about it
review.locationRemarks: Chilli's across the street and a big shopping mall about 10 minutes away on foot.

review.title: Why pay parking in sf when you can stay here?
review.reviewText: Great. Clean . Good quality. Noise of planes not a problem . Pool for your kids.

review.title: great hotel !
review.reviewText: This Hotel was great local is near airport , rooms clean lobby has all you would want ,StarBucks . Food near by as well . 25 min from San Francisco and 25 min to beach . Staff was friendly and helpful .
review.positiveRemarks: Local is very convenient , mall is less than 5 min away , Chillis is across the st. lobby is set up for work or play. Beds are comfortable .

review.title: Nice hotel convenient to the airport
review.reviewText: Our flight arrived late (after midnight) and the hotel staff were very accommodating and got us checked in very quickly. Comfortable big clean bed with white sheets, we were asleep instantly! Big room with a balcony to an interior courtyard. Quiet. Only complaint would be that there was no continental breakfast but we went to Never Too Latte down the street which was excellent. Good high way access to get into San Francisco quickly.

review.title: Nice hotel very comfortable
review.reviewText: This hotel is very comfortable staff is pretty nice very helpful. Definintly would go there again.
review.positiveRemarks: It was all just a great hotel.
review.locationRemarks: There is a mall and a shopping.center near by as well as chilis

review.title: nice Hotel in an attractive area close to the airp
review.reviewText: The rooms were very clean and modern. A few planes flew overhead but it wasn't an issue.
review.positiveRemarks: the free airport shuttle was great
review.negativeRemarks: nothing
review.locationRemarks: It was very convenient to the airport

review.title: Close to the airport
review.reviewText: This is was a small hotel that could use some renovation.
review.negativeRemarks: The beds were very uncomfortable, compared to other Marriott hotels.
review.locationRemarks: Good location

review.title: I love this hotel.... Best price around..
review.reviewText: This is a courtyard Marroitt , but dont be fooled is has everything you need , not to mention it is super nice and very calm. We didn't want to stay in SF, I wanted to save a few dollars. So I was looking for the least expense but yet closest nicest place to stay and this was it. I have to say if you dont mind a 15 minute drive into SF this is the place for you. This hotel is very modern in design. Would stay there agian all day long ....
review.positiveRemarks: The decor - no parking issue or extra cost - just about everything
review.negativeRemarks: Toilet's need more flusing power - outside of that Very Happy
review.locationRemarks: This location was good 10 minutes away from downtown SF- No parking issues or extra cost- indoor pool very calm easy acess lots of food around hotel-

review.title: Wonderful vacation hotel.
review.reviewText: As someone who has worked in the hospitality field in the past, I'm very critical of hotels and staff. I couldn't have been more pleased. The staff was one of the most sincere and helpful I've ever seen. They offered us great tips on where to go, and what to see, even lining up tour reservations for us. The room was very nice, and the beds were, well, let's just say we were trying to figure out how to sneak one out without the staff noticing. Very comfortable. (And with back problems I have, the bed really helped.
review.positiveRemarks: The friendly and helpful staff.
review.negativeRemarks: The price of the food.
review.locationRemarks: Very nice.

review.title: Excellent place to stay to visit SFO
review.reviewText: An excellent place for the price and its location. Quiet, clean, comfortable room, good service. Near a Bart station, easy to go downtown or to the airport

review.title: good rating
review.reviewText: Nice place to stay. It has all we needed for a pleasant evening.
review.positiveRemarks: The ppol was nice. The cafe was good too.
review.negativeRemarks: Stop spraying scent in the rooms.
review.locationRemarks: Chilis close by

review.title: The room is clean.
review.reviewText: The room was clean and big enough. However noise of air planes was so big and bad. I did not know about this so I could not sleep well. If you are light sleeper I don't recomend this hotel.

review.title: great hotel for the airport
review.reviewText: Night manager and shuttle driver very helpful. Room clean and comfortable.
review.positiveRemarks: Cleanliness and comfort
review.negativeRemarks: None
review.locationRemarks: Close enough to be convenient

review.title: Great for business travelers
review.reviewText: Near SFO airport so convenient for business travelers. Hotel provides parking for your car while you are away at a cheap rate and saves you money and time to parking at long term or short term parking at SFO. Hotel provides free shuttle service between hotel and SFO.
review.positiveRemarks: Cheap long term parking and free shuttle service to SFO.
review.negativeRemarks: No breakfast service early in the morning.
review.locationRemarks: Very close to SFO.

review.title: Great value
review.reviewText: Baseline for what a hotel should be. Clean rooms, courteous staff. Bonus points for a pool and gym, being close to airport, and coffee bar in reception area. Another bonus point for its pricing.

review.title: great for business trips
review.reviewText: This hotel has Good, comfortable, clean and nice atmosphere. I was there for business and had only one night and a long flight, so it was a very nice, close to the airport location.

review.title: Great for a quick stay close to SF Airport
review.reviewText: First room assigned had a load refrigerator, but staff moved me with no problem. Doors to get in were problematic, but again, staff was very helpful. Very close to airport and to restaurants and shopping. Very easy to find.
review.positiveRemarks: The people - everyone on staff was nice and happy to help you.
review.negativeRemarks: Doors in back (not operating or not operating well).
review.locationRemarks: Convenient for an urban stop. Not overly scenic, but then I was not expecting that in San Bruno.

review.title: Pleasant experience
review.reviewText: Staff are very friendly. Rooms are clean. Location is idea.
review.positiveRemarks: Cleaness
review.negativeRemarks: Noise from other room.

review.title: Outstanding!
review.reviewText: Very impressive lobby area with helpful information for travelers, well-stocked shop in lobby had everything you could need. Very nice indoor pool and hot tub. Convenient to several places to eat. The staff was quite helpful with our many questions about San Francisco. There is no free breakfast but there is an IHOP close by that was great. Felt very safe and enjoyed the stay. (2 adults with 2 children)
review.positiveRemarks: Lobby area, indoor pool was great for kids
review.negativeRemarks: breakfast not included
review.locationRemarks: convenient to main highways in SF making travel to tourist areas easy...felt very safe

review.title: Nice place in San Francisco.
review.reviewText: We had a great stay just outside of San Francisco. Nice indoor pool and hot tub. Close to restaurants and shopping. About a 20 minute drive to Golden Gate.

review.title: wedding weekend
review.reviewText: Quiet, comfortable, wonderful staff, excellent stay
review.positiveRemarks: location, nearby restaurants and stores, clean/safe location
review.negativeRemarks: doors are a bit noisy when they shut, but not a huge deal
review.locationRemarks: clean, safe, basic needs can be all met within half mile radius

review.title: San Bruno visit
review.reviewText: The hotel was very clean, the staff friendly and it was conveniently located to visit my daughter at school.

review.title: wrong bed size advertised - nightmare stay
review.reviewText: advertised as having QUEEN size beds. It was imperative to have QUEEN beds. I was making travel arrangements for someone who is disabled, and obviously needed to be in a handicapp accessible room, equipped with QUEEN beds. I stayed approximately 15 miles from my destination for this exact purpose. The beds were FULL/DOUBLE sized. I actually had a tape measure with me and I measured them and compared them to standard sizes on at least 10 websites. The management of the hotel said that Marriott had their OWN "Queen Sized" Bed - and this was the way it was. They would not allow us to have a roll-away in the bed - to gain additional sleeping space, with access to my handicapped relative, and they were not able to give us an additional room - with an adjoining door - as the hotel was sold out. We could not leave the handicapped person sleeping alone in any other room. The stay was a nightmare. We were unable to sleep with FULL Beds, and the management tried to make it seem like we were crazy to think they should have QUEEN beds. Clearly - the young manager has had no experience with a handicapped family member. He was VERY insensitive. In addition, the management was unavailable at all times that I was available. I had to leave the hotel room by 9:00 AM each day, and return later in the day - so it made it near impossible to discuss the situation. I actually changed my plans for leaving town, and stayed 3 hours later to be able to actually speak to a manager with authroity.
review.positiveRemarks: electricity, running warm water
review.negativeRemarks: lack of management's care/concern for disabled family member. Treated disrespectfully, as if I was a fool and didn't know what a QUEEN bed size was.
review.locationRemarks: South suburb of San Francisco - near freeway on-ramp access

review.title: I hope thsi is just human error
review.reviewText: I really like the hotel staff, location and general upkeep. I put a 3 for cleanliness of room because I was very disappointed to come back to a room that had not been cleaned and a bed not made on my second day there...
review.positiveRemarks: location
review.negativeRemarks: coming back to a room that was not made and cleaned
review.locationRemarks: close to airport

review.title: WOULD DEFINATELY REVISIT
review.reviewText: Very friendly and helpful staff. Nice pool and spa.

review.title: wonderful staff. clean and nice room. big comfy beds. exciting lobby & resources
review.reviewText: i love the hip modern clean vibe there. the style and overall ambiance of the hotel is pleasing and inviting. i love that guest can go down and get something to eat, lounge around and utilize the computers/media area. the city guide book inside the rooms were really helping in providing exciting places to go in the city book. i would stay there again.

review.title: Not Impressed
review.reviewText: When I checked in, the front desk didn't tell me about breakfast even though I paid for it. In the room, the bathtub was clogged up and the water drained very slowly. After the room was cleaned, the maid didn't re-supply the room with shampoo, conditioner or soap on any of the days I stayed there. The maid left my old towel on the floor. The area was not walking distance to any shops or any form of entertainment.

review.title: Great location, Typical Courtyard Comfort
review.reviewText: This Hotel is tucked away and quiet, yet it is located near restaurants, a mall, and is near the major freeways. A great place to stay outside the city, for a fraction of the price.

review.title: Average
review.reviewText: Good location, nothing fancy.

review.title: Would stay there again
review.reviewText: Room was comfortable, easy access to the City. Friendly staff

review.title: Yes
review.reviewText: Good

review.title: Great locations and amenities
review.reviewText: Really nice hotel, great lounge, excellent food choices, pool and spa are very clean and in good shape. Overall, very pleased.

review.title: Best hotel near SFO-will return
review.reviewText: The Courtyard by Marriott is a great hotel. Fast friendly checkin, took my request for 1st floor king room, and fulfilled it. Some other reports complained of noise. I did not hear a peep for entire 4day stay. Had a great walkout and view of inner courtyard. Decent pool, easy free parking. Very clean. Chilis across parking lot for lunch and dinner is nice. The Tamboran Mall is 3 blocks walking distance - try BJs for local brews, awesome. Ihop is nearby for bfast. Some good filipino restaurants in area. Super close to airport, but did not hear planes. Convenient hwy access and El Camino Real street in front will get you just about everywhere too, if you dont like hwys. High recommend, and I travel alot and am critical.

review.title: Bad bed
review.reviewText: Very poor bed compared to other Marriott's we have stayed at. Would not stay at this one again.

review.title: San Bruno, Not Impressed!
review.reviewText:
1. You have to call to be picked up they don't have a van going around the airport!
2. If you call to complain, they say they will monitor it, they didn't we had about 3 hours of sleep, from all the noise, kids screaming and running up and down the halls on our floor and above us!
3. We had a early morning flight, so we left at 4:20 AM, had to wait for the guy to show up!
4. I told the girl about our problem, she told me I should have called again and they would have monitored it! WHY SHOULD I HAVE TO MAKE A SECOND CALL!
5. This was a Sunday night, too bad, seemed like a nice hotel...
I would not stay at this hotel again ever!

review.title: Great for business trip
review.reviewText: The free shuttle to/from the airport is great! I often give some tips to the drivers which are appreciated. The hotel is quite close to the airport. In general, there isn't much traffic to/from SFO. It's great for business trip if your company is in San Bruno.

review.title: NIce stay!
review.reviewText: It was a great place to stay however their breakfast was not complimentary and rather pricey and not much to pick from.

review.title: Enjoyable
review.reviewText: Easy access to our room, free parking (difficult to find in this area) and very comfortable bed. The TV was not situated well but wasn't there to watch it either.

review.title: Wont be back
review.reviewText: call and make sure they are not remodeling before you come.

review.title: Good value. Would definitely stay again.
review.reviewText: We were very pleased overall with this hotel. Staff was friendly, room and facilities were very clean. We had a problem with toilet and were given another room immediately. The hotel offered a breakfast buffet that I felt was overpriced. We have had similar complimentary breakfasts at other hotels.

review.title: Overall good, but sometimes poor customer service
review.reviewText: Very easy to get to and from San Francisco International Airport; near expressway so easy travel; clean and well-maintained facilities; down side is that the "24 hour coffee service" isn't really so - there was no coffee at 7:30 a.m. on a Sunday. When I mentioned it to front desk staff, the woman looked up at me like I was an inconvenience, instructed me to get it from the kitchen area in the lobby where breakfast is served. Went to the kitchen area and asked for coffee since there was none at the 24 hour coffee service" area. The guy said ok, went into the kitchen, and didn't come back out. Complained at the front desk to the same woman and no response at all. . . no apology, just a look like she couldn't be bothered.

review.title: Impressed
review.reviewText: This is typical of a Marriott hotel. Always clean, friendly staff, and good service. They could improve their amenities by offering free breakfast, or at least offer guest discount.

review.title: cool
review.reviewText: quiet and serene surroundings

review.title: first and last stay
review.reviewText: I waited at the airport for the courtesy shuttle for over an hour. I called the hotel after the first half hour and they told me the shuttle would pick me up in 10-15 minutes - it never came and I had to find an alternate way. The remote control did not work. The cleaning people did not fully clean the room, leaving a tea bag in the sink and the trash can in the middle of the room. It was my first and last stay at a Courtyard Marriott.

review.title: A wonderful place to stay close to San Francisco
review.reviewText: We stayed at this hotel for two nights and were extremely satisfied. The rooms were very clean and comfortable, and the breakfast services were a delicious convenience. There are other restaurants, both sit down and fast food, as well as other useful retailers located very close to the hotel. At approximately fourteen miles from down town San Francisco, its worth the commute.

review.title: Guaranteed comfort
review.reviewText: Reliable and consistent in the two separate locations I stayed.

review.title: We'll Be Back!!
review.reviewText: Special comment: Water pressure in the tub was low--drainage clogged.

review.title: Below my expection, not worth over 4 rating.
review.reviewText: Just average hotel, not worth 4 rating.

review.title: Overall, a pretty poor experience
review.reviewText: This hotel needs to have some money invested in renovation and maintenance. The staff needs training in customer care. Upon arrival the front desk staff were supposed to give me a message telling me that my wife's plan was delayed by four hours. They forgot. That caused a lot of grief. Our room was way too hot. The thermostat did not work. Setting it to a lower temperature woud last about three minutes, then it went back to the old setting. Had to sleep with the sliding door open, hence constant airport noise. Charging for Internet access and for breakfast on top of an exorbitant room rate was the last straw. Don't stay there.

review.title: Very clean, large room, helpful front desk, good business centre (few mins to print a doc)
review.reviewText: The room was very clean and in order Large room Helpful front desk Good business centre (few mins to print a doc from a memory stick) Good breakfast buffet

review.title: Very accommodating and comfortable
review.reviewText: We stayed one night at the airport Marriott before our early morning flight back home. It was comfortable and the staff was very helpful. Since we left so early in the morning we didn't get to take advantage of the breakfast but they had snacks in a refridgerator that could be purchased and hot coffee to take with us. We stayed one night at the airport Comfort Inn and Suites when we arrived and it was in a terrible location. very scarey! I changed our last night reservation to this Marriott because I wouldn't stay there again.

review.title: Great location!
review.reviewText: This was a great location, close to the airport, easy freeway access, good restaurants nearby. If I had to find any flaw it might be that the in-hotel restaurant was kinda spendy. $12 for breakfast was a bit steep.

review.title: Really Good Service and room
review.reviewText: it was a nice stay,clean room and pool!

review.title: Nice, Clean, good location
review.reviewText: We got what we expected.We cant complain of anything but a couple of loud houskeepers that woke us at 9:00 am by talking in the hall way which we cant really blame hotel. This migt happen by loud passengers even. I think you get a rather good price comapring to the hotels in SF downtown in a nice quiet neighbourhood.

review.title: Great Stay
review.reviewText: Our stay in this hotel is one of the factor that made our trip enjoyable. Everything is clean, the staff are very friendly and accomodating and the location is accesible. I would go back again and stay here. Highly recommended!

review.title: Grerat hotel
review.reviewText: Good value ! In the hotel industry value good service and good staff atitudes dont always go hand in hand . after staying in many hotels on my 70 night stay in the US this one Ticked all the boxes for me

review.title: Quick way to the airport
review.reviewText: We needed a hotel to stay overnight near SFO because of an early flight. The room was great, there's a Chili's across the street for convenient dinner, and a hotel shuttle to/from the airport that runs starting at 5am made catching the flight easy and comfortable. About 10 minutes from the airport. Hard to beat.

review.title: Great location, clean and comfortable room
review.reviewText: My boyfriend and I stayed in the area to take in the sites of San Francisco and also a football game in Oakland. The location was perfect, only 15 to 20min to downtown SF and about 35min to Oakland. We had an very comfortable bed with plenty of extra pillows, something you usually have to ask for upfront at most hotels in this price range. The parking is free and plentiful, also the hotel is located close to freeways and a large mall with a target store for all those items you forgot to pack. The pool is small, but clean and well kept. Our room was cleaned every day of our stay and the staff was helpful with anything we needed. I would highly recommend this hotel for anyone who wants to visit SF, but does not want to pay the high price of parking at the downtown hotels (we paid $7 each day we parked downtown, the hotels charge 4x that). I really can't think of anything negative to say except that the breakfast service offered was a bit expensive, but we never tried it anyway with all the nearby restaurants.

review.title: comfortable stay
review.reviewText: the staff was very accomendating and helpful when asked for the best ways to get around. Taking the BART from san Bruno or even the airport, seemed like forever but at least we didnt have to worry about parking. Shuttle service wasn't too reliable at night but they paid for our cab so that was nice. the continental "free" breakfast wasnt free, i guess you have to request it online first before paying, but due to our mishap the hotel gave us both of our morning breakfasts for free. :) dont expect anything over the top glamourous, just comfort and really good service.

review.title: Nice hotel
review.reviewText: It was great.

review.title: Convenient location
review.reviewText: My only complaint was that it took too long for the shuttle to arrive, so I called a cab. Apparantly they were gassing up the van and did not mention that it was going to take longer than it should have. So, I spent $15 I did not need to spend if I had been informed.

review.title: Would stay again
review.reviewText: Clean n comfortable, but the carpet can use some updating. The room was small, but the bed was very comfortable.

review.title: Good location and price
review.reviewText: Stayed at several hotels in SF area and this place offers the best value for your money. Its close to the airport yet very quiet. The room was clean and the service was wonderful. Only complaint was the pricey breakfast, but it really is a good one with great variety.

review.title: Impressed, easy to go anywhere
review.reviewText: Hotel is close to airport, close to all interstates, includes reasonable breakfast restaurant, small pantry store...close to other restaurants...

review.title: Great Business Location
review.reviewText: Close to airport, easy to get to. Many choices for meals, hotel has a great breakfast.

review.title: Loved location
review.reviewText: I loved the location of the hotel. Maybe it was the cold weather, but the building and rooms were cold. Needed to ask for extra blankets as I don't like the noise of a heater at night. Sevice was excellent and blankets were brought to the room as requested though.

review.title: nice hotel would stay there if goin to SF for a vacation again
review.reviewText: This hotel is very comfy and convenient to anywhere you need to go in SF.They have a nice ok pool and whirl pool.Clean room nothing was missing when room was clean w/o any supervision.and there enough place to go around that area.

review.title: Looking forward to my next stay
review.reviewText: This is my favorite place to stay when in the San Francisco Bay Area. It is conveniently located to both San Francisco, the airport, shopping centers, restaurants and the places I like to visit. No charges for parking, a clean, comfortable room every time I stay here, free internet access, friendly staff, clean pool, clean grounds, clean restaurant. It is always a pleasure to stay there and not once have I been disappointed.

review.title: Comfortable beds, not many perks
review.reviewText: We recently stayed at this hotel for our third time in as many years. PROS: Beds are very comfortable, nice mattresses, thick cotton bedsheets and bedspreads, not the polyester nonsense found in most hotels. This hotel is close to SFO, and the jumbo jets take off right over the hotel, but rooms are remarkably soundproof to outside and hallway noises. CONS: Room phone didn't work. Parking is very bad, few spaces. Upper rooms accessed only by stairways or elevator on the far ends of the building, and parking spots often nowhere near your closest entry door. During our whole 3-day stay one outdoor was broken for keycard entry, meaning very long hike with luggage to room. Jaccuzzi was also busted for the entire stay. Morning buffet breakfast, far from free like many hotels is $10.99 a person! Bathroom toilet had water-savers each side of fill basin and level set so low that it often clogged, necessitating removing the top and manually holding the float down to get enough water to properly empty the bowl. Shower wasn't completely clean.

review.title: I love the cleanness and comfort of this hotel. Everything looks brand new.
review.reviewText: My wife and I were so impressed with how the room was so nice and clean. We could rest because of the comfort of the room. Now, when we stay in more expensive hotels we always compare it with this one.

review.title: Nice Hotel
review.reviewText: I enjoyed my stay there. I wish I could find out what brand of mattress they used because it was really comfy.

review.title: Nice hotel
review.reviewText: This hotel has a very good maintenance. It is new! If you want to have a breakfast, you should get it. It is very good! It is just 15 min to San Francisoc downtown. I would stay in this hotel again!

review.title: Great stay at a great price
review.reviewText: Very conveient place to stay..close to airport and quick access to freeways. Lots of places to eat close by. Since the hotel has been recently updated everything seems new & well maintained. Very good value for money. I would recommend this to all travellers.

review.title: Clean and Modern - Reasonably Priced
review.reviewText: Most everything about this place was very good. I like that there was coffee available 24 hours and a small convienence store on site with a microwave. The room was very clean and modern. Did not have any meals but it did smell great. I was dissappointed with the room having a spece in the dresser for a small microwave and fridge, but did not provide those luxuries. Small but adequate fitness room, (3) cardio, (1) universal weight machine, TV, water, & towels. Housekeeping decides what type coffee you get for your in-room coffee pot (better like decaf). So get dressed and walk to the lobby to get a hot cup, it's good! As for the consumables, i.e. lotion, soap, etc., they never made it to my room.

review.title: Suitable
review.reviewText: Confusing pricing.

review.title: Really decent, especially for an airport hotel
review.reviewText: I was impressed with the courteous service and cleanliness of this hotel. Breakfast is also a good deal here.

review.title: Great for business travellers
review.reviewText: Besides being clean, staffed by friendly people, having an in-door pool and meeting rooms, free internet access is definitely a plus as is the printing center.

review.title: Easy access to Downtown, Airport, and Monster Park
review.reviewText: We stayed there so we could catch a football game. The room was very nice and the bed very soft with 5 pillows. The staff was friendly and helpful. It is right off of the highway and it was very easy to get to downtown FIshermans Wharf and Monster Park for the football game. There is also a Chili's a block away that you can walk to.

review.title: Good convenient place to stay
review.reviewText: Slightly removed from SFO, but convenient and different from typical airport hotel.

review.title: Great Service
review.reviewText: A VERY nice staff and VERY responsive to guest needs. The shuttle service saved me from missing my plane and they were very helpful with instructions, directions, ideas for what to do etc. Highly recommend this Courtyard and it is 4 minutes from the airport, could not be more convenient!
